00066                 function autoAuth() {
00067                         include("config.php");
00068                 
00069                         // $certAttributeToDisplay
00070                         if (isset($_SERVER['SSL_CLIENT_VERIFY']) && ($_SERVER['SSL_CLIENT_VERIFY']=="SUCCESS")) {
00071                                 $cert = openssl_x509_parse($_SERVER['SSL_CLIENT_CERT']);
00072                                 if ($cert) {
00073                                   $dn_cert=$cert["name"];
00074                                         $pattern="/$certAttributeToDisplay=([^\/=]+)/";
00075                                         preg_match($pattern, $dn_cert, $matches);
00076                                   // Debug
00077                                         /*echo "<p>You are : $matches[1]</p>\n";
00078                                         print "certificate: ".$dn_cert."<br />\n";
00079                                         echo "<p>pattern=$pattern</p>\n";
00080                                         print_r($matches);
00081                                   echo "<pre>\n";
00082                                   var_dump($cert);
00083                                   echo "</pre>\n";
00084                                   */
00085         }
00086                                 
00087                                 // Return the name to display !
00088                                 return (!empty($matches[1]))?$matches[1]:"Unknown user";
00089                         }
00090                         else {
00091                                 echo "<p>No certificate received from the web server</p>\n";
00092                                 return false;
00093                         }
